TEXT: Comes from Anastasia Universe, Shion fights with her Funnels. NL She synchronized her capability, with an intention to slay the Spire.
Girl of vampire descent from other sphere, NL here to investigate this towering remain of a broken world.
Former priestess and supporter of Shion, NL summoned by the Spire and decides to inspect further.
An Elven priest rescued from the combat with the Worm. NL She conducts battle simulation training to improve her power of proficiency in earth and wood magic.
